post.body: Definitely don't miss the weather in AB! Stay warm and bundled up. Good luck with the shopping, and Merry Christmas.
Pipes feeze up, but if you leave the tap running the water won't freeze, hopefully.
Was blowtorching pipes the other day. My friends coffee shack froze up. Places that aren't used to low temps, aren't set up for it.
I lost over $100, jerks! Not to mention they charged me a $65 dollar fee! Oh well. Ebay sales are now done in CAD only 4 ME.
Just spent 1/2 hr on the phone with them. There's nothing I can do, it's a CND PP account, all money out of it must be in CAD.
I want to get a Lisa for Christmas! I got most of what needed doing done. Now I sleep, cuz tomorrow, er...today, we play!! Have a good 1!
all Love, Peace and Hapiness, for today, tomorrow, and the rest of the year. You guys are the best support system ever! Thanks.
Busy day filled with last minute prep. I'm off the computer for the rest of the day. Merry Christmas to my Twiiter friends. I wish you...
Santa Claus comes tonight, tonight, Santa Claus comes tonight! Kids are bouncing, I'm bouncing, FUN FUN FUN!!
Does anyone else think the Arrogant worms would be a great addition to the cruise?
I think the cold has hit my chest, can't quit coughing, and I'm running a fever w/chills. Yuck. Now I have to get through work.
We have so much snow! And they say we'll be getting another dump in the next couple of days. There's over a foot on our deck. Crazy!
Anybody else having a hard time loading the video from the new FTR? Won't play past a certain point, then stops and reloads the page.
Yep, he's a reader now boy! Can't stop him, and we can't spell in front of him anymore either! DH is suggesting pig latin to talk secretly.
Banana Pancakes! Yummy! House decorated a bit more, feeling ready for the guests on Christmas day. DS Is loving watching me Twitter, lol!
Arg! PayPal wants to exchange my money from USD to CAD with a crappy rate! I don't want to buy their CAD, just put the USD into my account!
4 more sleeps to a 4 year old means we must get trained up on our early morning rising. 6:30 just isn't fair when it's my morning to get up!
Tree up, floor done (minus closets and baseboards), shopping done. Off to get groceries in the snow. Christmas can commence!
Sold both of the coins, and now I have some extra cruise money! Maybe even a flat screen TV for Christmas for me!!! Ahhhh, stress reduced.
SARAH!!!!!!!!!! (hyperventilating!!)
